parameters.initialMessages:
Hi there! 👋
You can ask me things like: “Is the Rig available next week?”  “Where is the neo VI?”  “Who borrowed the SIM card?”  “有多少个手机可借?”  "我想借用树莓派" Feel free to ask anything!

parameters.text:
={{ $json.chatInput }}
First, check the sheet for equipment that might be related to what the user wants. Users usually don’t provide an exact name or ID—they might just give a general category or use different wording. You should first run a fuzzy search across the sheet to pull any gear that might match.
For every possible item print the full details (e.g. id, name, category, description, total / available qty, next-available date if out of stock).

If the user shows intent to book (keywords: “book”, “reserve”, “borrow”, “rent”, “use”, etc.) , check if it’s available (you should make this judgment). If it is available, give them this link: https://tinac41025.app.n8n.cloud/form/64850e9c-37a4-4183-ad19-7e7644d91f58(it must be output as a hyperlink) and tell them to fill out the form. If it’s not available, let the user know that it’s not available, who is borrowing and the expected returned date.

If the user wants to locate a tool (keywords: “where”, “location”, “placed”, “who borrow”, “room”, “site”, “哪裡”, “在哪”, “位置”, “放”， “在谁那”， “谁借""), search the sheet for that item and return its exact location string (e.g. “RDC”, “New bund”, “borrower”).
If the location is missing or blank, notify the user.
If the tool is being borrowed, notify user who is the latest borrower, and the expected return date.
If user want to return the device,give them this link: https://tinac41025.app.n8n.cloud/form/d18d7635-aa47-4c04-a9a8-817af9ecffbd(it must be output as a hyperlink)

Make sure your output is visually clear and well-structured—use formatting, sections, bullet points or tables to make information easy to read and attractive.

nodes.name: Get row(s) in sheet in Google Sheets

parameters.completionMessage: =The device number or device name you entered does not exist or does not match our records. Please check your input and try again. click here
Your submission was received. Please wait for the device owner’s approval.

=Your request to borrow could not be processed because the device is currently unavailable. The current user is: {{ $('可用性检测').item.json['当前使用者'] }}. If you would like to try borrowing another device, please submit a new request using the form below: click here

parameters.subject: =Borrow Request From {{ $('借用申请触发').item.json.CDSID }}
=Return Request form  {{ $('归还申请触发').first().json.CDSID }}
Renew Submission
parameters.message: =I want to renew the device:{{ $('续借申请触发').item.json['设备名称'] }}(device ID：{{ $('续借申请触发').item.json['设备编号'] }}) until {{ $('续借申请触发').item.json['预计归还时间'] }}

parameters.subject: Return Notification
parameters.html:
=The device:{{ $json['设备名称'] }}（device ID:{{ $json['设备编号'] }}）you borrowed is Expired,if you want to return click the following link:(https://tinac41025.app.n8n.cloud/form/d18d7635-aa47-4c04-a9a8-817af9ecffbd) to return the device
If you want to renew the device,click( https://tinac41025.app.n8n.cloud/form/ad6e3a78-f4c5-4b70-95b8-7e5442b0d664 )to submit your application.

parameters.subject: Return Successfully!
parameters.html:
=Dear {{ $('归还申请触发').first().json.CDSID }},

Your return request has been successfully processed.

parameters.subject: =Fail to renew!
parameters.html: The device you are renewing is not in the borrowing status. Please reconfirm the device you want to renew.

parameters.completionMessage:
=The device you return is not in borrowing.
Please check the status of the device you return!

parameters.subject: Renew Successfully!
parameters.html: =The device {{ $('续借申请触发').item.json['设备名称'] }}({{ $('续借申请触发').item.json['设备编号'] }}) is renewed until {{ $('续借申请触发').item.json['预计归还时间'] }}

parameters.completionMessage: =The device number or CDSID or email name you entered does not exist or does not match our records. Please check your input and try again. click here

parameters.subject: =Your borrowing request has been rejected
parameters.message:
=Dear {{ $('借用申请触发').item.json.CDSID }},

We regret to inform you that your request to borrow {{ $('借用申请触发').item.json['设备名称'] }} has been rejected.

Reason for rejection:
{{ $('借用申请审核1').item.json.data['拒绝理由'] }}

parameters.subject: Fail to return!
parameters.text:
=Dear {{ $('归还申请触发').first().json.CDSID }},

We regret to inform you that your request to borrow {{ $('归还申请触发').first().json['设备编号'] }} has been rejected.

Reason for rejection:
{{ $json.data['拒绝理由(If decline)'] }}
